title: Oh yeah that's great
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/ready-set-play-earn-party-rewards-all-week-long

So basically, we can't actually do anything but Ranked to get the extra bonuses, because we are OCE and don't have draft normals yet, that seems fair.

replies.body:
and NA Korea and taiwan have bigger bonuses just cos team fire won the allstars....the amount of IP we earn has been minimised because we need to reward the slightly better luck of 1 team playing TANDEM mode better than the other.....

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/ready-set-play-earn-party-rewards-all-week-long

at least i got my free awesome cosmic reaver kassadin skin as a proud OCE player, OH WAIT....

Well I think you detected a hint of sarcasm there, but honestly in the new season, ranked is much more of an enjoyable experience for me, and normals just don't have the same level of team organization that the new ranked does.
